string-array.name: Variable
string-array.item: string (any characters could be typed in)
numeric (only number could be typed in)
date (only form of date could be typed in. ex : dd/mm/yyyy)

resources.string: From the analysis result we know that the significance value (0.741) is more than α (0.05). So the conclusion is there is no difference with the determined value and could be tolerated.
From the analysis result we know that the significance value (0.355) is more than α (0.05). So the conclusion is there is no difference of the average number of patients of both hospitals.

The significance value of the score of grade X before and after taking courses (0.001) is less than α (0.05) and the correlation value is 0.775 which close to 1. So the conclusion is there is a difference of the average exam score and have a strong correlation between the pairing.

The significance value of the score of grade XI before and after taking courses (0.001) is less than α (0.05) and the correlation value is 0.780 which close to 1. So the conclusion is there is a difference of the average exam score and have a strong correlation between the pairing.

The significance value of the score of grade XII before and after taking courses (0.004) is less than α (0.05) and the correlation value is 0.699 which close to 1. So the conclusion is there is a difference of the average exam score and have a strong correlation between the pairing.
Need to know if the production machines are still functioning well by collecting data samples of polymorphs’ weight produced per day
Need to know if there is any difference of the average number of patients between Hospital A and Hospital B within 15 days as samples
Need to know if there is any difference of the students’ average exam score in every grades of before and after taking extra courses by random sampling from each grades.
